title: Zeta | SDE1 | Fresh Grad | PPO
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: Fresh Grad
Prior Experience: NA

Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Zeta
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 16LPA
Stock bonus: 3.2L (25% each year)
Joining Bonus: 3.5L locked in for 1 year & 2L locked in for 2 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 21.5 LPA
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: PPO after winter internship
